Package bg.tu_varna.f22621629.handlers

Class XMLFileHandler

java.lang.Object
bg.tu_varna.f22621629.handlers.XMLFileHandler
public class XMLFileHandler extends Object
The XMLFileHandler class is responsible for handling XML file operations such as opening, reading, and saving sessions. This class follows the singleton pattern to ensure only one instance is created.
